item.text: As one of Viral Academy [[Teachers]] my main interest is Distributed Team Work and Web based Project Management Tools supporting it.
I
I am currently designing a [[Course]] for [[Crypto Academy]] on Basics of Blockchain Technology, Decentralised Consensus and its role in society.

I am currently designing a [[Course]] for [[Crypto Academy]] on Basics of Blockchain Technology and its role in society through practical examples. It's purpose to popularise technology and principles of decentralised consensus. I am also a contributor to World Crypto Network.

I have a background in media and social science, and interested in the intersections of technology and society.

I am currently working on a [[Course]] for [[Crypto Academy]] on Basics of Blockchain Technology and its role in society through practical examples. It's purpose to popularise technology and principles of decentralised consensus. I am also a contributor to World Crypto Network.
I have studied media and social science, and interested in the intersections of technology and society, participatory design and decentralised infrastructures.

[[Ksenia]]
item.title: Welcome Visitors

item.text: My name is Ksenia, I'm a Viral Academy teacher. I was born in Moscow and currently based in Sweden.
As one of Viral Academy [[Teachers]] my main interests are P2P Learning and Distributed Team Work as well as Web based tools supporting it.

I am currently working on a [[Course]] for [[Crypto Academy]] on Basics of Blockchain Technology and its role in society through practical examples. It's purpose to popularise technology and principles of decentralised consensus. I am also a contributor to World Crypto Network podcast.
The [http://viral.academy Viral Academy] is a project to create a new [[Free Culture]] educational methodology based on [[Small Group Work]] and [[P2P Teaching]].
item.title: Viral Academy

item.text: I am a member of [[Crypto Academy]] and working on a part which covers on Basics of Blockchain Technology and its role in society through practical examples. item.title: Recent Changes

item.text: You can see my Work Log and recent changes I have made to this wiki.
Stuff I'm working on:

I'm interested in federated information infrasctuctures, and Decentralised Team Work and Governance and technology supporting it. Smallest Federated Wiki is one of the tools I am currently experimenting with alongside with more widely known project management tools.
[[Ksenya's Sites]]
Community of people experimenting with Smallest Federated Wiki format as a federated knowledge ecosystem.
